com.indeed.status.core

Class AbstractStatusUpdateListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indeed.status.core.AbstractStatusUpdateListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusUpdateListener

    public class AbstractStatusUpdateListener
extends Object
implements StatusUpdateListener
    Convenience class for handling common "important" status updates.
    Author:
    matts
